answers.answer: when was the glucose test done ... was it a fasting test or random.  If random, it was a useless test. if fasting then yes you should be concerned.Of more concern is loosing weight without trying.  That is one of the mager symtom of early T1 diabetics

question: My glucose has always been normal.  I have been steadily losing weight and now weigh 102.  I previously 208.  I lost my weight without trying, but doctors say I'm fine.  I just had labs done and all liver tests decreased but still within normal levels, but most alarming to me was my glucose level rose from 95 to 113.  Should I be concerned?
title: my glucose level rose over 3 months
